INSERT INTO assessment_items (assessmentId, requirementId, status, evidence, notes) VALUES

(5, 8, 'compliant', 'Security measures adequate', 'Passed security audit'),

(7, 9, 'compliant', 'Comprehensive logging', 'All generations logged'),

(8, 8, 'compliant', 'Security measures strong', 'PCI DSS compliant'),
(8, 9, 'compliant', 'Audit trail complete', 'All decisions logged'),
(8, 10, 'in_progress', 'Registration in progress', 'High-risk registration');
